item.title: Second Day
item.description:
Second day fiddling via the CLI and git and hugo. And here is a list of things that I have done.

  1. Tweaked my Zshrc config file with a bunch of UI hacks.
  2. Upgraded my command line tools to Big sur’s versions, it was outdated, surprising that I was running CLI tools from Mojave if I am not wrong.
  3. A first time ever 60 tabs on the current Firefox window, mostly due to debuggings.
  4. Learnt about submodules and how to get them working.
  5. Comparing VS code vs Sublime for use against git while also using github apps.

Thanks to the new SSD all of this is a breeze and I am not worried about keeping things within the 128gb partition of the fusion drive. Thats it for now.

item.title: Testing From Big Sur.
item.description: I am testing if things moved out well with Hugo after the upgrade to Big sur on the iMac. ü§ûüèΩ This worked much better than I expected. So not bad at all. All the changes survived through the upgrade. So this rocks.
